patterns: How we can apply for makeup exam?
what can I do if I miss my mid term exam?
responses: Collect makeup forms from examination section in academic block. Get it signed from designated faculty. Complete this process within 15 days after completion of mid semester exams.
Coding club, Robotics, Literature, Fine Arts, E-cell

patterns: What is served as breakfast on monday morning
responses: Methi paratha / Onion paratha(Alternate), Sabji(Aloo white matar), Milk(100ml)

patterns: What is served as breakfast on tuesday morning
responses: Bread, Butter and Jam(Both according to preference), Boiled egg (Non-veg) / Paneer pakora(veg), Banana

patterns: What is served as breakfast on wednesday morning
responses: Dal puri, Aloo white matar sabji / Aloo chana sabzi [alternate week], (seasonal fruit 3 times in a month)

patterns: What is served as breakfast on thursday morning
responses: Sandwich, Egg bhurji (non-veg) / Paneer bhurji (veg), banana

patterns: What is served as breakfast on friday morning
responses: Uttapam, Sambar, Banana, coconut(fresh) / peanut chutney[alternate week]

patterns: What is served as breakfast on Saturday morning
responses: Dosa, Sambar, coconut[fresh]/ peanut chutney[alternate week]

patterns: What is served as breakfast on sunday morning
responses: Aloo Paratha, Badam chutney + chana dal(winter seasonal chutney)(Dhana, tomato, chilli) / Chole Bhature[alternate week]

patterns: What is served as lunch on sunday afternoon
responses: Veg Pulao(with ghee), French fries, Malai Kofta, Roti, papad

patterns: What is served as lunch on saturday afternoon
responses: Plain Rice, Roti, Papad, Masoor dal, rajma, seasonal fry

patterns: Who is the supervisor of gargi?
Can I know contact details of gargi supervisor?
responses: There are two supervisors of Gargi. Mahoya mam and her contact is 9xxxxxxxx4. Rumita mam and her contact is 6xxxxxxxx4

patterns: Who is the warden of gargi?
Can I know contact details of gargi's warden?
responses: There are two wardens of Gargi. Ranjita Das mam and her contact is ranjita.nitm@gmail.com. Shikha Maurya mam and her contact is drshikha.ece@nita.ac.in

patterns: How much is my hostel fee?
What is the process of hostel fee payment?
responses: The process to know and pay your hostel fee is to go to your mis -> ONLINE PAYMENT -> SBI E PAY -> common payment interface. (Note: If you are joining hostel for the first time you have to pay your initial hostel fee of 7000/-)

patterns: How to take an emergency leave from hostel
What is the process to apply for leave?
How can I get my leave approved immediately
responses: To apply your leave go to your mis -> HOSTEL -> Transaction -> Leave application. (Note: This is only applicable when you apply 5 days prior to leaving. If it's an emergency fill the emergency leave application and get it signed by HOD, supervisor, Warden, Chief Warden.)

patterns: When is food available in mess?
Timing to get food in mess
responses: Mess available timings: Breakfast -> 7 AM to 9 AM(7 AM to 9:30 AM on weekend), Lunch -> 12:30 PM TO 2:30 PM, Dinner -> 7:30 PM to 9PM

patterns: What are the rules of hostel
Activities which are not allowed in hostel
responses: You must stay inside the hostel after 7 PM in winter and after 7:30 PM in summer. You must sign your attendance before your intime every day. You are not allowed to use electrical appliances like heaters, induction stoves, hair styling tools etc.

patterns: No of blocks available in gargi
What are the blocks present in gargi
In which will I stay in gargi
responses: There are five blocks present in gargi hostel. Mtech and PhD students will be allotted E1 block. 1st years will be allotted E2 block. 2nd years will be allotted E4 block. 3rd years will be allotted E3 block. 4th years will be allotted E5 block.

patterns: What is the cycle allotment process
How can I get a cycle?
Are cycles available in gargi hostel
responses: If you want a cycle, write an application letter and get it approved by your HOD and submit it to your supervisor. If a cycle is available you will be allotted one. You have to do the same every semester (Note: There are limited number cycles which are divided among all the years. So hurry up!)

patterns: What are the cleaning dates of hostel
How frequently cleaning is done in hostel
How many days per week cleaning is done
responses: Rooms, corridors and washrooms will be cleaned on every Monday, Wednesday and Friday

patterns: Who are the members of mess committee
responses: Members of mess committee are Krishna, Anjura, Megha Sikder, Athithi Kumari, Gargi Jaiswal, Nipobithi, Purba, Shreya, Anjali, Bhumi Gowtham, Adithi Manoj Thakur. They ensure that the quality and quantity measures, mess menu are properly followed.
Raheena Bin Mohammad is Vice President of Girls.
Medical facility is available in NITA hospital for all the students. For further details contact: 90******23
Ambulance contact: 8837274038 AND inform supervisor on number: 90*******46

patterns: How to apply for intime extension
responses: Write an application letter (INFOMRMING CAUSE OF DELAY) to the current hostel warden and submit the approval to reception

patterns: How to give a water complaint
responses: For MESS complaints, write a mess complaint register available at mess. For room, washroom, and water-related complaints - BLOCK COMPLAINT REGISTER. Further details contact VP on: 80********32

patterns: how will i get room in gargi
responses: After hostel fee payment, goto MIS >> HOSTEL >> TRANSACTION >> AUTOMATIC ROOM ALLOTMENT

patterns: how do i drop out of hostel
responses: Write an application to chief Warden along with hostel leave form and attach your bank passbook. submit it to chief wardern office and a copy to hostel supervisor
